channel.title: I need help
channel.description:
Okay im making a ixat server and i keep getting this error [code]Error SQL query:
-- -- Base de datos: `tuto` -- -- -------------------------------------------------------- -- -- Estructura de tabla para la tabla `bans` -- CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `bans` (
`chatid` INT( 11 ) NOT NULL , `userid` INT( 11 ) NOT NULL , `unbandate` BIGINT( 20 ) NOT NULL ) ENGINE = MYISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = latin1;
MySQL said:
#1046 - No database selected [/code]
Can help me?

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

You need to tell MySQL what database to use. Make sure that it actually does exist.

P.S: Give up on Xat; it is fucking retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @andrew7903 andrew7903
item.description:
@andrew7903 wrote:

Okay im making a ixat server and i keep getting this error

[code]Error
SQL query:

–
– Base de datos: tuto

–
– Estructura de tabla para la tabla bans

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bans (

chatid INT( 11 ) NOT NULL ,
userid INT( 11 ) NOT NULL ,
unbandate BIGINT( 20 ) NOT NULL
) ENGINE = MYISAM DEFAULT CHARSET = latin1;

MySQL said:

#1046 - No database selected [/code]

Can help me?

Read full topic
